qas.question: When did Valencia C.F. win the UEFA Cup?
How many times did Valencia C.F. win the Spanish league?
In which division does Huracan Valencia play?

context: Valencia is also internationally famous for its football club, Valencia C.F., which won the Spanish league in 2002 and <a0_0>2004<a0_0/> (the year it also won the UEFA Cup), for a total of <a1_0>six<a1_0/> times, and was a UEFA Champions League runner-up in 2000 and 2001. The team's stadium is the Mestalla; its city rival Levante UD also plays in the highest division after gaining promotion in 2010, their stadium is <a2_0>Estadi Ciutat de València<a2_0/>. From the year 2011 there has been a third team in the city, Huracán Valencia, who play their games in <a4_0>Municipal de Manises<a4_0/>, in the <a3_0>Segunda División B<a3_0/>.
